name: permanency
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
staying the same or continuing for a long time: I started to have some doubts about the permanency of the arrangement. There is never any sense of permanency when you are working in the music industry.
More examplesFewer examplesMany of our casual workers are looking for employment opportunities that offer greater permanency.This ruling does not have the permanency of law.The atlas always gives me a sense of the solidity and permanency of the world.She knew that the material was flimsy and the painting would have no permanency.
